dcmGridColumn

  • - directive in module dcm-ui.grid

Creates a grid column. The contents of this tag will be compiled. Any attributes that aren't params will be duplicated onto this cell in each row.

Directive Info

  • This directive executes at priority level 0.

Usage

<dcm-grid-column foo="bar">{{someField}}</dcm-grid-column>

Arguments

Param Type Details
title string

title for the col header
field
(optional)
 string

a field from the row data to either use as the sort value. If no content is provided to this element this field will be interpolated into this col in the grid.
width
(optional)
 string

if specified will be put into a style="width: ;" on the col
sort-type
(optional)
 string

if sorting on the grid is enabled this allows you to override the default sorting type for this col
sort-default
(optional)
 string

makes this col the default sort for the grid, may be ASC or DESC

(default: ASC)
